title: Elementalist Tileset Definition File
description: A JSON schema for defining a tileset for the Elementalist game

identity.description: The name or identity for the tileset. This is used in other game data file to reference the tileset. It should be unique across all tilesets in the game.

path.description: The path to the tileset image, inside the assets directory. (e.g. 'tileset/my-tileset.png')

tileSize.description: The size of each tile in the tileset, in pixels

width.description: The width of each tile in the tileset, in pixels

height.description: The height of each tile in the tileset, in pixels

numTiles.description: The number of tiles in each row of the tileset

row.description: The number of tiles in each row of the tileset

column.description: The number of tiles in each column of the tileset
